thread.title: Bonnie Sue
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Bonnie Sue

author: Bonnie Sue
title: Bonnie Sue
text: Great experience at your Denton store yesterday. Tony Perez helped us pick out a bedroom set, and it was great working with him. Tony's very knowledgeable about your stock and made the whole process easy, from choosing the right components to arranging financing to arranging delivery. All in all a very positive experience, and we'll most definitely remember Tony and The Home Zone for future purchases.
